cause.description:
Rudy Giuliani is strongest presidential candidate running and deserves the vote of everyone who wants a positive change in America's direction
1. Rudy Giuliani is the best presidential candidate in the 2008 election.
2. Rudy Giuliaini will make America stronger.
3. Rudy Giuliani will be an awesome president.
cause.mission: Get Rudy Giuliani elected as the President of the United States in 2008.
cause.name: Rudy '08
